cpr_robot::Robot::IOchannel Struct Reference

This struct holds information about a digital input or output channel: whether it is on a sperate IO-board or associated to a joint and the index of the module/joint. More...

Public Attributes

uint8_t ChannelIndex
 The physical channel index on the corresponding module. A maximum of 8 channels per module is supported. More...
 
uint8_t ModuleIndex
 Index of the associated element in m_pDigitalIOs or m_pJoints. More...
 
std::string Name
 
bool OnSeparateModule
 If set to true the I/O channel is associated with an element of m_pDigitalIOs, elsewise with an element of m_pJoints. More...
 

Detailed Description

This struct holds information about a digital input or output channel: whether it is on a sperate IO-board or associated to a joint and the index of the module/joint.

◆ OnSeparateModule

bool cpr_robot::Robot::IOchannel::OnSeparateModule

If set to true the I/O channel is associated with an element of m_pDigitalIOs, elsewise with an element of m_pJoints.
